ccrnList.description: List of CCRNs included in the bundling

bundlingCode.description:
Response Information Code:
11 - The bundling of CCRN(s) with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 30 minutes after successful bundling.
12 - The bundling of CCRN(s)with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 5 minutes after successful bundling.
13 - The amendment of bundling of CCRN(s) with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 30 minutes after successful amendment of bundling.
14 - The amendment of bundling of CCRN(s)with the vehicle is successful. The subject vehicle can cross the LBCP for customs clearance after 5 minutes after successful bundling.
